# SSA Vic Council 2021

```{r}
person <- function(img, name, position = NULL) {
  position <- ifelse(is.null(position), "", 
                     paste0("**", position, "**"))
  glue::glue(".person[
                    .circle-image-120[
                    <img src='images/council/{img}'>]
                    {position}  
                    {name}]")
}
```
